description:
The slow-motion resignation of Prime Minister Justin Trudeau is finally official.  After months of plunging polls, lost by-elections and an accelerating caucus revolt, Trudeau deigned to throw in the towel on his unpopular reign after a new Liberal leader is chosen sometime in the next three months.  Already there is chatter among Liberal loyalists that […]

The post The Wrong Lesson From Trudeau’s Fall Is That Climate Action Is Unpopular appeared first on DeSmog.
title: The Wrong Lesson From Trudeau’s Fall Is That Climate Action Is Unpopular
